column2: "Where's Echo? How do I say this... We kind of got into a fight."
"It's the same reason as always. She always brings up stuff from the past and I snap."
"I wonder why she likes to drag things out like that."
"Do I really look that distraught? I guess I probably do."
"When my teacher left... even though he said I couldn't go with him... why didn't I go anyway?"
"That day, 10 years ago... Why was I only a ranger, supporting from the back lines?"
"When I start thinking about it, I just can't stop myself."
"I'm not thinking about the present? You might be right."
"Sorry for talking so much. I'm going to go apologize to her."
